page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {IN LUTHRIE AND MOONZIE, NEAR CUPAR, {FIFE, SCOTLAND,}MOST OF THE LAND IS USED FOR{FARMING}.THERE ARE ABOUT TEN FARMS ALTOGETHER ALL OVER OUR BLOCK. A VERY SMALL PART OF THE LAND IS USED FOR{FORESTRY}. MOST OF THE TREES ARE{NON_CONIFEROUS}.THERE ARE ABOUT 4 WOODS ALTOGETHER IN OUR AREA. THE NEAREST{SHOPS}ARE AT{CUPAR}WHICH IS ABOUT{7\ KM}AWAY .THERE IS A{CHURCH JUST OUT OF{LUTHRIE}AND A DISUSED ONE AT{MOONZIE.}THERE ARE ALSO SOME{HOUSES DOTTED ABOUT THE AREA. THERE ARE 2 {RUINED CASTLES}AND A{DOVECOT}. THE {CASTLES}ARE AT{PARBROATH}AND {LORDSCAIRNIE}AND THE{DOVECOT}IS AT {PARBROATH}. A DISUSED{RAILWAY}RUNS THROUGH OUR AREA. THE ONLY SCHOOL IS{CREICH PRIMARY {SCHOOL}IN{LUTHRIE}, BUT THERE USED TO BE ONE AT{MOONZIE}WHICH CLOSED WHEN NUMBERS DROPPED.
